attributes.action: to introduce free & plentiful two wheel vehicle parking in all congestion chargeable zones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a ‘green’ petition to introduce free & plentiful two wheel vehicle parking in all congestion chargeable zones.

This is a call to central government to introduce fair schemes for commuters.

London’s public transport system is currently dangerously over subscribed without sight of future solutions. This petition requests the sensible encouragement of alternative 'greener' forms of transport such as two wheel vehicles should be encouraged.

Currently there is little incentive to encourage commuters to travel into London on two wheels. Parking is too expensive to justify the additional road accident risk.

Two wheel vehicles include motorbikes & bicycles.

Signatories should recognise that vehicle or bicycle security & safety are separate issues which are being addressed by other petitions.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "to introduce free & plentiful two wheel vehicle parking in all congestion chargeable zones."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16628


Prime Minister's Office
